p: Biochemical analysis of serum samples was performed using an automatic chemistry analyzer (COBAS INTEGRAÂ® 400 Plus analyzer.), including albumin (ALB), alkaline phosphatase (ALP), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), aspartate transaminase (AST), bilirubin (BIL), cholesterol (CHOL), triglyceride (TRGL), creatinine (CRE), and urea (URE).
